Package game.core

Class Summary
AI AI
Class used for manage artificial intelligence of enemies
LogicAmmoPack Class LogicAmmo
Represent pack of ammunitions the player can catch and use
LogicCharacter Abstract Class LogicCharacter
An abstract class that represents the player and enemy
LogicEnemy Class LogicEnemy
Representation of logical enemy
LogicEnergyPack class LogicEnergyPack
Represents an energy pack the player can catch and use when his energy (life) is few
LogicPlayer Class LogicPlayer
Logic representation of the player
LogicWeapon Class LogicWeapon
Represent the game weapons
LogicWorld Class LogicWorld
Main class that handles all the communication between the Logical and the Graphical world.

It manage the score level
